name: Drakkenheim Outer City
description: The ruined streets outside the city walls of Drakkenheim, where mutated monsters lurk and arcane anomalies alter reality itself.
impulses: Misdirect and disorient, destroy and contaminate, show signs of the apocalyptic meteor

features.title: Buried Bounty
features.description:
The city has glowing delerium to uncover and countless mysteries to unfold. A PC who seeks a delerium claim or knowledge about the fallen city can make an Instinct or Knowledge Roll to learn about this place and discover (potentially contaminated) loot.

  • Critical Success: Gain valuable information and a related useful item and a delerium claim.

  • Success with Hope: Gain valuable information and a delerium claim.

  • Success with Fear: Uncover vague or incomplete information.

  • Any Failure: Mark a Stress to find a lead after an exhaustive search.
features.question: What greater secrets does the city contain? What predatory delerium-touched creatures lie in wait? What doomed adventurers have met a bad fate here already?

features.title: Delerium-Touched Creatures
features.description: Adversaries who appear here are fully contaminated; They have immunity to contamination and mutation, they can see through the haze without issue, and they can spend a Fear to heal 2 Hit Points while within a scene with a delerium claim.
features.question: What of their appearance speaks to their original form before they mutated? How did the mutation affect them, and why?

features.title: Arcane Anomaly
features.description:
Spend a Fear to manifest the eldritch echo of the disaster that ravaged the city. Activate a Progress Countdown (5) as the arcane anomaly appears around the PCs . To complete the countdown and escape the anomaly, the PCs must overcome threats while recalling history and finding clues to escape the inevitable.

The effects can mean the appearance of a creature, marking Stress or Hit Points, losing Hope or gaining Fear. Describe the anomaly, ask a player to describe it, or use one of the following:

  1. A fundamental law of reality such as air, gravity, time, or space fails or behaves strangely.

  2. Nearby objects animate and whisper terrible truths, or a PC becomes possessed and speaks something dark in the voice of someone long dead.

  3. A PC blinks through fragments of its own timeline, their form changing visibly to others as it happens. What do they see?

  4. Shadowy hands, black tentacles, or a hypnotic pattern of impossible colours erupts, dealing damage or Stress.

  5. Ghostly visions show creatures dying from any major damage they take. When they take major damage, they must also mark a Stress.

  6. Corpses rise, an extraplanar adversary appears, shadows attack their owners, or nearby objects animate. Spend a fear to make their first attack an automatic success.

  7. A PC is polymorphed, turns invisible, becomes hasted, or is otherwise altered, yet they remain the same mechanically. How?

  8. Flowers and a confused aquatic mammal appear very far overhead. “Oh no, not again…” Thinks the flowers.
features.question: What is the source of the anomaly? How do we navigate it? Can we use it to our advantage?
